post.description: Create a new dataset from a Postgres database query

400.description: Invalid request body or database connection error

post.description: Update an existing dataset with a new file from S3

400.description: Invalid request body or S3 file access error

post.description: Upload a file from S3 and create a new dataset

400.description: Invalid request body or S3 file access error

get.description: Retrieves a summary of the specified dataset

parameters.description: Name of the table to get summary for
parameters.name: tableName

404.description: Invalid query or table not found

get.description: Get all chats for a specific user with pagination

post.description: Create a new chat or continue an existing chat conversation with AI about a dataset

201.description: Chat created/continued successfully" // Ensure models.ChatWithMessages is the correct response structure

post.description: Create a streaming chat conversation with an AI agent about datasets or projects

parameters.description: Chat ID for continuing existing conversation
parameters.name: x-chat-id

delete.description: Delete an entire chat and all its messages

get.description: Get all messages from a specific chat with pagination
Get details of a specific dataset

post.description: Convert a natural language query to SQL for a specific dataset

400.description: Invalid request or could not generate SQL

get.description: Get all projects with pagination and search

post.description: Create a new project with the given name and description

get.description: Get details of a specific project

patch.description: Update an existing project's name and/or description

get.description: Get all datasets in a project with pagination
Get details of a specific dataset in a project

delete.description: Delete a dataset from a project

get.description: Get the schemas information for a dataset/table

post.description: Execute a SQL query on a dataset (only SELECT statements are allowed)

get.description: Query a dataset using REST-style parameters

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of columns to return
parameters.name: columns

parameters.description: Sort order (column name with optional -prefix for desc)
parameters.name: sort

api.nl2SqlRequest.description: Request body for converting natural language to SQL

query.description: Natural language query to convert to SQL
query.example: show me total sales by region

table.description: Name of the dataset/table to query

api.sqlRequestBody.description: Request body for executing a SQL query

query.description: SQL query to execute (only SELECT statements are allowed)

chats.chatRequestBody.description: Request body for creating or continuing a chat conversation

chat_id.description: Unique identifier of an existing chat (optional for new chats)

dataset_id.description: ID of the dataset to analyze

content.example: Show me the total sales by region

chats.chatWithAgentRequestBody.description: Request body for creating a streaming chat conversation with an AI agent - OpenAI compatible

database.createRequestBody.description: Request body for creating a database source dataset

connection_string.description: Connection string for the Postgres database

description.example: User data from our production database

project_id.description: ID of the project to add the dataset to

created_by.description: CreatedBy represents the user who created the dataset

format.description: Format of the dataset (e.g., csv, parquet)

row_count.description: Number of rows in the dataset

size.description: Size of the dataset in bytes

updated_by.description: UpdatedBy represents the user who last updated the dataset

description.example: This is a sample project description

projects.createRequestBody.description: Request body for creating a new project

description.example: This is a detailed description of my new project

projects.updateProjectBody.description: Request body for updating an existing project

s3.updateRequestBody.description: Request body for updating a dataset from S3

dataset.description: Name of the dataset to update

file_path.description: S3 path of the new file (optional)

s3.uploadRequestBody.description: Request body for uploading a file from S3

file_path.description: S3 path of the file to upload

project_id.description: ID of the project to add the dataset to
